pageContext.claim: “@Twitter is now interfering in the 2020 Presidential Election. They are saying my statement on Mail-In Ballots, which will lead to massive corruption and fraud, is incorrect, based on fact-checking by Fake News CNN and the Amazon Washington Post....”
pageContext.analysis: Trump went ballistic when Twitter -- for the first time ever -- added a fact check link at the bottom of one of Trump's false tweets alleging voter fraud. There's no merit to his claim of election interference. He was spreading misinformation about an election, which is against Twitter's terms of service.
